trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expone los tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> a la automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> para el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> creada para la <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> permanece en memoria hasta que el asociado <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> se destruye.

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La misma instancia de la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> procedentes de las llamadas subsiguientes a este método y llama a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: El tipo del mismo nivel viene determinado por la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> devolución de llamada virtual.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> no implementa la devolución de llamada, ya no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> se crea, y este método devuelve `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> para el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />; or <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> was not created by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> o <see langword="null" /> si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> no se creó con el método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.UIElement)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la tecla de aceleración del <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado con este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la tecla de acceso del elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />. <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Tecla de acceso para el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el tipo de control correspondiente al control <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: El valor de enumeración <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la cadena que identifica de manera única el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que representa el rectángulo delimitador de <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que está asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that contains the coordinates of the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que contiene las coordenadas del elemento.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, si el elemento no es <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> ni <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />, este método devuelve <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de elementos secundarios del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: A list of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Lista de elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: Cadena <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> que representa el espacio interactivo que se encuentra en <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que está asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> en el elemento que permite un clic.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Los valores de punto son (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) si el elemento no es <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> ni <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la cadena que describe la funcionalidad del <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, la cadena que se devuelve es el mismo texto que proporciona el control en la información sobre herramientas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una cadena que comunica el estado visual del <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el estado de un contacto de messenger puede ser "Ocupado" o "En línea".

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una cadena legible que contiene el tipo de elemento representado por el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Ejemplos de cadenas son "Mensaje de correo", "Contacto" y "Documento".

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para el elemento destinado al <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> de este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para el elemento destinado al <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> de este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: El elemento como destino el <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> puede ser un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, pero no tiene que ser.

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: Si es un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, y establece la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> propiedad establecerá automáticamente el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> propiedad así.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene las características de notificación de la región activa del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que está asociado a este elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of the live region.
trans-unit.target: Características de notificación de la región activa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la etiqueta de texto del <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> funciones de propiedad similares a una cadena de texto que los usuarios usan para explicar el control hacen referencia.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que tiene una representación textual de todos los controles en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] por lo que puede hacer referencia al control mediante programación en su forma adaptada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> está colocado en una dirección determinada.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: El valor de enumeración <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" />.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Valor de la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el patrón de control para <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> interface if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> si <paramref name="patternInterface" /> es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; de lo contrario, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que se asocia a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> tiene actualmente enfoque de entrada de teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el elemento tiene enfoque de entrada de teclado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que está asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> es un elemento que contiene datos que se presentan al usuario.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el usuario final entiende como interactivo el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, el usuario podría entender que <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contribuye a la estructura lógica del control en la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> puede aceptar el foco de teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="boolean" /> que contiene el valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> puede aceptar el foco de teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el elemento puede aceptar el foco de teclado; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> está fuera de la pantalla.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el elemento no está en la pantalla; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no indica si el elemento está visible.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: En algunas circunstancias, un elemento se encuentra en la pantalla pero aún no está visible.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si el elemento aparece en la pantalla pero ocultos por otros elementos, podría no ser visible.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, el método devuelve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> incluye contenido protegido.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> se exige que se complete en un formulario.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, if it's set; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="boolean" /> que contiene el valor devuelto por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, si se establece; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el foco de la acción del teclado en el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> llama a este método.
